text: Delta Alpha Pi (ΔΑΠ) is an American Honor Society founded in 2004 to recognize high-achieving college and university students with disabilities.MWCC students inducted into Delta Alpha Pi Honor Society.New mentor program for students with disabilities Membership is open to both undergraduate and graduate students at colleges and universities with chartered chapters of DAPi and who meet certain criteria: ==History== Delta Alpha Pi was founded in 2004 at East Stroudsburg University of Pennsylvania. It became national in 2006 and became a not-for-profit 501(c)(3) organization in 2008 as "Delta Alpha Pi International Honor Society"Delta Alpha Pi Honor Society - About Us Delta Alpha Pi has over 150 chapters.Delta Alpha Pi chapters ==Symbols== The three Greek letters have specific meaning. *Delta – D for Disability *Alpha – A stands for Achievement *Pi – P represents Pride ==References== ==External links== Category:Honor societies Category:2004 establishments in Pennsylvania Category:Student organizations established in 2004 Category:Disability organizations
title: Delta Alpha Pi (honor society)
